channel.title: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest, how?

item.title: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest, how?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

case 28164: // First Slot in your quest Log
sendFrame126("@dbl@Quest: Name Of quest", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("", 8148);
sendQuest("", 8149);
sendQuest("", 8150);
sendQuest("", 8151);
sendQuest("", 8152);
sendQuest("", 8153);
sendQuest("", 8154);
sendQuest("", 8155);
sendQuest("", 8156);
sendQuest("", 8157);
sendQuest("", 8158);
sendQuest("", 8159);
sendQuest("", 8160);
sendQuest("", 8161);
sendQuest("", 8162);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
break;

item.source: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest, how?

item.title: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest, how?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well when you click the custom quest “Corporal Punishment” I want the interface to pop up…

This is where I put Corporal Punishment…

sendQuest("", 7338); sendQuest("", 7340); sendQuest("", 7346); sendQuest("", 7341); sendQuest("", 7342); sendQuest("Corporal Punishment", 7337); sendQuest("", 7343); sendQuest("", 7335); sendQuest("", 7344); sendQuest("", 7345); sendQuest("", 7347); sendQuest("", 7348);

And this is the quest interface void…

[code] public void CorpPunHelpMenu() {

    sendQuest("@dre@Corporal Punishment", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("@dbl@Quest Guide", 8145);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Requirements: High Combat Levels and a High Summoning Level@dbl@", 8147);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@You can start the quest by speaking to King Percival@dbl@", 8148);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@King Percival's son's chest is at 2839, 3598@dbl@", 8149);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@The special door is at @dbl@", 8150);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8151);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8152);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8153);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8154);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8155);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8156);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@@dbl@", 8157);
    sendQuest("@dbl@-------------", 8160); 
							
    sendQuest(
            "@dbl@@dre@Type ::castlewars for info on theiving stalls there@dbl@",
            8161);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@-------------@dbl@", 8162);
    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@-------------@dbl@", 8163);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
	
}

[/code]

And I would also like it so that when you finish the quest the quest on the list turns green how do I do that?

Read full topic
item.source: I want the quest interface to pop up when you click on a quest, how?
